post:
Greetings LET.

While we put the finishing touches on our KVM lineup in Dallas, we wanted to offer up some OpenVZ plans in Chicago for the LET community.

**LET Special (Chicago, OpenVZ)**

10GB Disk
250GB Bandwidth (100Mbps Port)
128MB Dedicated Memory, 192MB burst
1 IPv4, 16 IPv6
$6.00/month
https://order.knightswarm.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=34

Test IP: 107.6.136.3
[Speed Test](http://107.6.136.3)
[Public Pingdom page](http://status.knightswarm.com)

Notes: IRC is allowed, torrenting is not.

Instant activation (after manual approval for new customers).
Email/ticket and phone support available in English and broken Swedish.
Payment Methods: PayPal, Google Checkout, Credit Card

As it's our first offer here, I've included links to public whois for your convenience.
[WHOIS - knightswarm.com](http://whois-server.net/?query=knightswarm.com)
[WHOIS - knightswarm.net](http://whois-server.net/?query=knightswarm.net)
[WHOIS - awrotech.com](http://whois-server.net/?query=awrotech.com)
[WHOIS - knightswarm.se](http://whois-server.net?query=knightswarm.se)
